title: Matching (1 point each)
instructions: Select the correct answer from the dropdown.

prompts.question: What made loading much faster in the 9th generation of consoles?
Technology that superimposes a computer generated image or game on a user's view of the real world?
What game first popularized the first person shooter genre?
What 2009 game is widely considered the first Souls game?
Who invented the predecessor to Monopoly in 1903, The Landlord's Game?
A collection of API's that made it easy to develop, install, and run PC games?
What happened in the early 70s for electronic gaming?
The first home video game system, which was invented by Ralph Bear in 1972?
Which video game contained a mod that popularized the Multiplayer Online Battle Arena (MOBA) genre?
What action-adventure survival did very poorly on initial release but slowly built up a base?
Games prior to the 19th century were primarily ________ games
Who pioneered the ability to play multiple games on a single console?
What sub-genre of game often required backtracking with new abilities to access new parts of previous areas

word_bank.text: The Crash and Recovery of the Game Industry
